titles.title: Over-the-Counter Monograph Safety, Innovation, and Reform Act of 2018

bill.summary:
Over-the-Counter Monograph Safety, Innovation, and Reform Act of 2018
This bill amends the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to substantially revise how over-the-counter (OTC)drugs are approved.
